summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.GetDocuments to get a list of all documents that have been registered with the Microsoft Active Accessibility run time. Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

param.name: enumUnknown
param.para: A list of document interface pointers.

remarks.para: Servers might need to poll this method more than once before they receive a document. There can be a limited time lapse (approximately second) between when a document appears in the system and when it is registered with document services.

summary.para: Clients call the IAccClientDocMgr.GetFocused method to access a pointer for the document that has focus. Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

param.name: riid
param.para: IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.

param.name: ppunk
param.para: Interface pointer to the document being requested.

remarks.para: If the window that has focus is not a document that implements the interface, ppunk will be NULL.

Servers might need to poll this method more than once before they receive a document. There can be a limited time lapse (approximately second) between when a document appears in the system and when it is registered with document services.

summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByHWND to get a document by providing the HWND for the document. Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

param.name: hWnd
param.para: The HWND of the document to be returned.

param.name: riid
param.para: IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.

param.name: ppunk
param.para: Interface pointer to the document being requested.

returns.para: If not successful, returns the following value or another standard COM error code.

description.para: If the HWND does not correspond to an active document, then ppunk will be NULL.

remarks.para: Servers might need to poll this method more than once before they receive a document. There can be a limited time lapse (approximately second) between when a document appears in the system and when it is registered with document services.

summary.para: Clients call IAccClientDocMgr.LookupByPoint to get a document object from a point within the document. Note Active Accessibility Text Services is deprecated. Please see Microsoft Windows Text Services Framework for more information on advanced text input and natural language technologies.

param.name: pt
param.para: A point inside the bounding rectangle of the document to be returned.

param.name: riid
param.para: IID of the document being requested. This is usually IID_ITextStoreAnchor.

param.name: ppunk
param.para: Interface pointer to the document being requested.

returns.para: If not successful, returns the following value or another standard COM error code.

description.para: If the value in pt does not fall within the bounding rectangle of an active document, then ppunk will be NULL.

remarks.para: Servers might need to poll this method more than once before they receive a document. There can be a limited time lapse (approximately second) between when a document appears in the system and when it is registered with document services.
